main.name: Rikki Kendall
main.occupation: I'm an Orlando, Florida based Software Developer and recent Duke Computer Science grad. I have strong ambitions to grow through challenging myself with new projects and ideas every day
main.bio: I'm a 2020 graduate of Duke University and commissioned 2nd Lieutenant in the Air Force Reserve as a Cyber Officer.
main.contactmessage: Please feel free to contact me!

work.description: Built two pedestrian bridges for isolated communities in Bolivia • Managed design and construction of 83m pedestrian bridge • Re-established EIA and Bridges to Prosperity Chapter at Duke University

work.title: Volunteer Developer & Student Ambassador for Campus Engagement
